TopicTitle: Reapers Dutch Designs (my first real 1.0 entry plane on the forum) the B3 bomber

Articles.Content:
Well there you have to look at, it fly's

slow, but it fly's.

![sXdu2Yw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sXdu2Yw.jpg)

craftfile:

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-30T12:21:41Z" title="04/30/2015 12:21  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 30, 2015</time> by soulreaver1981**
No offence, but it looks like you just added some wings to an old 0.90 craft and made some aerobrakes out of elevons.
Awesome ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). Does it tend to spin out on you ever?

> 
> No offence, but it looks like you just added some wings to an old 0.90 craft and made some aerobrakes out of elevons.

nope its a rebuild. the elevons on the wings are neede to pull up and steer ( the normal elevons appear to work the wrong way around so they are turnd of)

and my previous had only 2 engine's and not 6.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Awesome ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). Does it tend to spin out on you ever?

no butt it turns real slow.

Isn't is supposed to be "bomBer"?

or is bommer a really fancy name?

> 
> Isn't is supposed to be "bomBer"?
> or is bommer a really fancy name?

Thats my bad grammer

fickt it

Oh, no worries for that ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Very good job with your B3, gave it dry-run, most definitely needs some torque-ing for a fix, or maybe RCS, other than that, I very much adore the craft's... feel ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
